message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.NI, cs.SY 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper focuses on designing a secured cloud infrastructure and conducting penetration testing to validate the effectiveness of the security controls. This falls under the scope of cs.CR.
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper discusses the deployment of a multi-node cloud infrastructure using OpenStack, which is a distributed computing platform. This falls under the scope of cs.DC.
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper discusses the design and implementation of a cloud infrastructure using OpenStack, which involves software engineering principles and practices. This falls under the scope of cs.SE.
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper discusses the integration of legacy systems and third-party applications with the OpenStack cloud platform, which involves networking and internet architecture. This falls under the scope of cs.NI.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses the deployment and testing of a cloud infrastructure, which involves systems and control principles. This falls under the scope of cs.SY.
